kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
@dilipthakuri
Hey! Welcome to the Kentico Community Portal!
This Q&A is focused on questions and discussions [about Xperience by Kentico](https://community.kentico.com/blog/welcome-to-the-kentico-community-portal).
If you have questions about Kentico Xperience 13 and previous versions, you'll find more engagement and support [over on DevNet's Q&A forums](https://devnet.kentico.com/questions-answers).
You can also try the [Kentico Community Slack organization](https://kentico-community.slack.com), which has [a dedicated channel for Kentico Xperience 13](https://app.slack.com/client/T2XPKUBM4/C2XPMSKNJ).
